item.description: Futurists, like Ray Kurzweil, speculate about the coming Singularity - the time when machine intelligence will surpass human intelligence creating a rapid and profound shift in the fabric of human history.  Whether or not this prediction comes true to its full extent, there is no doubt that technology will continue to drastically change our lives and our relationship to life.  Tonight we will watch the recent documentary about Kurzweil and his ideas: Transcendent Man ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ntY01qoIdus ).  After the film, we will have a group discussion about what this technological future will mean to consciousness and culture - looking at it from an Integral framework.  (Note: This will be our last meetup until the fall, so please come out and join us! We will start promptly at 7:15 pm.)
item.name: Consciousness and the Singularity
